title: Bamboo and Poem
marks: Signature, Seal, and Marks L center, black ink
description: four lines of calligraphy, closely spaced with signature line near L edge; sprigs of bamboo drawn in ink in LRQ; light grey ink line across URC, and horizontal grey line to L of bamboo; red relief seal URC; two red relief seals in LLQ
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
